sailpoint.workflow

Class PAMLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.workflow.PAMLibrary

  • public class PAMLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    A workflow library with methods that are used with PAM workflows.

      • createApprovalSetFromPamRequest

        public ApprovalSet createApprovalSetFromPamRequest(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                            throws GeneralException
        Create an ApprovalSet from the PamRequest in the given workflow.

        Note: The PAM workflows use a PamRequest to handle approvals instead of an ApprovalSet because originally the PAM requests were a bit different than LCM requests. This is no longer the case, so we should at some point move to using an ApprovalSet in the PAM workflows and phase out PamRequest.

        Parameters:
        wfc - The WorkflowContext.
        Returns:
        An ApprovalSet with information from the PamRequest in the given workflow.
        Throws:
        GeneralException
